title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being satisfied it is
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (International Protection 
Appeals Tribunal) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 31 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) (international protection appeal tribunal) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 31 december 2020

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being satisfied it is
heading: 2. The International Protection Appeals Tribunal, in respect of its holding
text_raw:
2. The International Protection Appeals Tribunal, in respect of its holding 
of hearings under section 42 of the International Protection Act 2015 (No. 66 of 
2015) and for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), is designated and may 
hold such hearings before it by remote hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [715] 3
